text: Ashley Joanna Williams is the main protagonist of the Evil Dead franchise created by Sam Raimi and played by Bruce Campbell. ==Fictional biography== Ash Williams has read the text of the Necronomicon Ex Mortis and accidentally caused a Deadite to take control of his hand. He cut it off with a chainsaw and used a chainsaw as his second hand. He time traveled to the Middle Ages and wanted to get back to the present. ==Reception== Ash Williams is considered one of the best horror movie heroes of all time. title: Ash Williams
